article_title: Cigarette blamed for Standish fire, chief said — Portland — Bangor Daily News — BDN Maine
article_text:
STANDISH, Maine — A cigarette is blamed for a fire that burned a garage and home Sunday, local fire officials told CBS 13.

Firefighters said the fire broke out around 7 p.m. on Watchic Manor Road in Standish. They found heavy fire in the garage, which spread to the home and caused smoke and water damage.

The fire department said no one was hurt. Fire Chief Brent Libby said Monday improper disposal of a cigarette was the cause of the fire.

article_summary:
STANDISH, Maine — A cigarette is blamed for a fire that burned a garage and home Sunday, local fire officials told CBS 13.
Firefighters said the fire broke out around 7 p.m. on Watchic Manor Road in Standish.
Fire Chief Brent Libby said Monday improper disposal of a cigarette was the cause of the fire.
They found heavy fire in the garage, which spread to the home and caused smoke and water damage.
The fire department said no one was hurt.
